      • moveTowards

        public void moveTowards(Point point,
                        float speed)
        Move this RigidBody towards the selected Point.
        This will also detect collision between other objects.
        Parameters:
        point - - (Point) X and Y coordinates to move towards.
        speed - - (float) Value in pixels/seconds to move with.
        Since:
        2016-02-04
